## Gaps & Issues
*   **AI agents** show brittle **long-horizon planning** and lack robust evaluation ("MobilityBench"), preventing real-world application.
*   **Multimodal generation** struggles with **consistency** and controllable reasoning; latent space imagination fails to produce grounded logic.
*   Scaling **world models** for agents creates critical inference bottlenecks in memory and compute ("DualPath", "SeaCache").

## Research Opportunities
*   Fuse **memory-augmented LLMs** with physics-aware **world models** ("GeoWorld") for grounded agents with generalizable dynamic planning.
*   Integrate **causal diffusion models** to enforce physical plausibility and logical coherence in generated audio-visual scenes.
*   Develop **probabilistic adaptation** ("MedCLIPSeg") to specialize foundation models for high-stakes domains using sparse expert data.
